caption: The image displays a chilly, winter scene focusing on icicles formed on thin, delicate branches of a tree. These icicles are detailed, hanging downwards in a dense cluster, covering the branches completely and reflecting some light that makes them glisten. Below the hanging icicles, there is a pile of jagged rocks, also partly covered in ice, reflecting light and adding a rugged texture to the scene. The background is dark and blurry, making the ice-covered elements in the forefront more pronounced. The overall atmosphere is wintry and the lighting suggests that it is either dawn or dusk, adding a touch of gloominess to the scene.
title: Ice-encrusted plants inside the seawall of Michigan City
